Hence , single step medium create allow embryo choose necessary nutrient maintain stable culture environment . Previous study suggest high blastulation rate single step medium sequential medium . This Randomized control trial ( RCT ) study compare blastulation rate single step culture medium sequential culture medium . Stimulation protocol antagonist . Patient consult day ultrasound meet inclusion criterion sign consent form . Then , nurse open letter contain type medium case . The medium prepare inside lab day oocyte pick-up . After oocyte pick-up , oocyte-cumulus complex ( OCC ) culture 2 hour 37°C , 6 % Carbon dioxide ( CO2 ) 5 % oxygen ( O2 ) . Meanwhile , sperm preparation perform use gradient technique . After 2 hour , OCC denude culture 1 hour Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) . Oocytes ICSI culture group 3-4 oocyte condition 37 ° C , 6 % CO2 5 % O2 . Fertilization check procedure 16-18 hour ICSI . On day 3 , embryos evaluate 66-68 hour ICSI , grade 1 embryo identify 7-9 blastomere fragmentation 0-10 % . The patient inform embryo quality . If embryos decide day 5 transferring , patient consult transfer day 3 . Blastulation rate record . For sequential culture medium group , embryos transfer Sequential Blast medium . For single step culture medium group , embryos transfer new culture dish medium . On day 5 , embryo quality assessment 116±1 hour ICSI . Blastocyst grade base expansion , inner cell mass quality , trophectoderm quality . Two good blastocyst transfer . After 11 day , beta-human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) test require . If beta-hCG result positive , examination need 3 week luteal support give 7 week .
